TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UsingTaskCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of all [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elements in a project.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of objects that is the destination of the elements copied from . The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.

Gets a value indicating the number of objects in the .
Docs.value: An integer value representing the number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> object in the collection represents a element in the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection>.
